Text:
Thanks to the uploader...a nice copy. The movie, though now nearly 40-years old, is considered one of the all-time-best dramas. A true story about the French Resistance during WWII.

...and thanks to 'joseph...' for listing the subs.
how come this is a 720p and it's so small?
Looks like there is a slight problem with the sound, some kind of weird compression.
